game.name: It's Fine
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Publisher moved the deadline. You have 24 hours to ship Version 1.0. Survive the indie dev crunch in this active incremental. Generate code with GPUs, radioactive squirrels, and a literal Kraken. Stack 100s of upgrades, trust your dog Joe, and grind until it compiles. It's Fine!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Publisher moved the deadline. You have 24 hours to ship Version 1.0. Survive the indie dev crunch in this active incremental.
